attributes.action: ensure that all revenue raised from environmental taxation is ring-fenced and only spent on the promotion of energy-efficient products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the underlying principle behind this petition is to ensure that 'environmental' taxation is not channelled into government funds but is specifically used for the promotion of energy-efficient measures - eg. grants for solar panels/wind turbines on domestic housing -
